Facebook's working on "Facebook at Work"

Facebook's working on "Facebook at Work" — A standalone version of Facebook for your workplace. Could be useful at large organizations, where the internal intranets are usually terrible. For smaller shops though, I’d recommend Slack.

Published 16 November 2014

Enjoy your day.
